attributes.action: resolve the West Lothian Question by resigning (and ordering all other scottish constituency MPs also to resign) and let the people who have been voted for and given a mandate by the people - who are being most badly affected by the actions of our current scottish constituency MP dominated government - to run the country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Anybody who cannot see that having scottish constituency MPs in the House of Commons is akin to the American people allowing people elected in Iran to help run their country, is living on a different planet.  Having scottish constituency MPs in the UK government is a travesty of democracy which Gordon Brown just does not have the testicles nor the basic honesty to resolve, because it is the 'Gang of 43' which is keeping him in power.

rejection.details: The Prime Minister cannot 'order' other MPs to resign.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
